title: Cannot do voluntary acts of worship due to illness or travel, what to do? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: aslam is so beautiful that Allah is the most merciful the Prophet says arisen Allah will record to a person when he's sick or travel or traveling what he used to do when he was well and residing hmm type ok I'm sick I can't pray night prayer I can't fast Mondays and Thursdays you see what the similar word you will get dirty word so one youth when you think of this you have no other choice but to love Allah soldier
